list.abs: I was just doing some ones I wanna oblivious of any other involved or irrespective things and finally when I got it , I thought it enough .我只是做一些个案，我想，无视任何其他涉及或不论东西，最后，当我得到它，我还以为它不够的。

34.regardless of: despite, in spite of,irrespective of, 不顾，不管---He continued speaking, regardless of my feeling.
resistant to 有抵抗力的irrespective of 不考虑,不顾及touch down 着陆

entry.tran: 不考虑…的;不顾…的;不受…影响的
entry.def: If you say that something happens or should happen irrespective of a particular thing, you mean that it is not affected or should not be affected by that thing.

example.ex: ...their commitment to a society based on equality for all citizens irrespective of ethnic origin...
example.tran: 他们承诺建立一个不分种族出身、全民平等的社会

example.ex: This service should be available to everybody, irrespective of whether they can afford it.
example.tran: 这项服务应该面向所有人,不管他们是否负担得起。

means.word_mean: 1. in spite of everything; without regard to drawbacks;

sentences.sentence: "he carried on regardless of the difficulties"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"使……,成为,进入,再"; 2. 放在同辅音词根前表示"不,无"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不顾的, 不考虑的, 无关的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ir不,无+respective各自的→adj.不顾的, 不考虑的, 无关的
ir不,无+reproachable能被指责的→adj.无可指责的
ir不,无+resistible可抗拒的→adj.不可抗拒的
ir不,无+resolute果断的→adj.无决断力的
ir不,无+refutable可反驳的→adj.无可反驳的
ir不,无+revocable可取消的→adj.不可取消的
ir使……,成为,进入,再+rupt断+ion表名词→打断[别人]→闯入
ir不+regularity整齐, 匀称→n.不规则,无规律
ir使……,成为,进入,再+rig水+ate表动词→进水→灌溉
ir使……,成为,进入,再+rit擦+ate表动词→进入磨擦→激怒
ir使……,成为,进入,再+radi光线+ate表动词→发光→生辉

means.word_mean: 不顾的;不问...的;与...无关的
